messages.title: Working for a Future to be Proud of

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Views on spending and resource use in armed and coast-led industries.
Views on NHS ownership and transitioning to services such as biotechs.
Perspective on education system and train services.

issues.economy: Green economy and creating jobs being equal issues to green and social justice when framing the local outcome wars.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been privileged to be able to work with excellent people who are prepared to change and who wear their hearts on their sleeves. I have also had the opportunity to travel widely, and, having seen the different cultures in this world, I've realised that we can, and must, live together respectfully and peaceably. That is why I have decided to put the most critical matter of our time, how we live together on this finite Earth, at the forefront of my efforts.

contactInformation.address: Brookthorpe, Perch Road, Cirencester, Gloucestershire, GL7 1NG

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world - Gandhi.

images.caption: Kevin Lister's photo with a caption: 'Vote for Kevin Lister'
